data.title: Great pizza
data.text:
One of the best pizza I've ever had the pizza sauce hands down is the best pizza sauce in South Florida.

Polly is a character super friendly and very customer service friendly. He is from Kosova and kills worth his pizza and subs. 

If you come here for Jaxson's Ice Cream and don't try Polly's Pizza you haven't really experienced Dania!

data.title: A Family Business You Can Trust
data.text:
Our limo company takes workmen comp patients to a rehab center that is a few store fronts away from this pizza restraunt. I was waiting for client & saw this pizza place. I walked in and asked if they served pizza by the slice. I ordered two pieces. Client texted me & stated that she was ready for pick up. On way back to clients home. I was eating pizza. He cooked it perfectly. Light golden brown. Great sauce, thick cheese, great peperoni & perfectly spiced. I was in love. A few days later I took some of the girls that work for me over to Paulis Pizza for dinner. We sat down and ordered a pie & wings. Superb. We were all HAPPY. Pauli & his wife were very attentive to our needs. Two fantastic people. 
   In my opinion. Within my top 5 of pizza restraunt. If you are in Fort Lauderdale area. About a 10 minute ride south of Fort Lauderdale Airport. Scope this place out. 
It is worth the trip. TCB                                                                                

aabacablimo.biz

data.title: Tasty but
data.text:
We were in for a cruise and ordered delivery to a hotel. The pizza and pop were delivered timely. But considering it was delivered to a hotel, it would have been nice to have paper plates and napkins delivered too. 

The pizza was hot and very good. The driver was friendly. Just a little challenging to not have plates and napkins.

data.title: Best NY Style Pizza in So. Florida.
data.text: This is the best NY style pizza I have eaten here in Florida, has the best chicken and veal parm meals and sandwiches, and Pauli himself is delightful.  It couldn't be better.  I look forward to visiting some time when Pauli has some fresh Pasta e Fagioli -- as I've only managed to get there when he has minestrone which is really good, too.  I wish he made zabaglione, but he may be willing to make it if I ask.  He's a sweetie.  I'm so glad I found this place!

data.title: Great subs
data.text: So my girlfriend and were planning to get some ice cream . When I came across this pizza joint and had great time . Talked to owner which he was a good person. I had mozzarella sticks that was good and my girlfriend had there pizza which was okay , my girlfriend thought it was great , but the Phillips cheese stake was absolutely fabulous. Must try ...

data.title: Great Food
data.text: Great local small business.  Prices are very affordable.  Great pizza drink lunch deals. Service excellent.  Food fresh and hot. Seating available inside and out.  Try their fresh pastas as well

data.title: Pauli's Pizza - Dania Beach - 104 S Federal Hwy - 954-922-5554
data.text:
This little pizza shop, in the Jaxson Ice Cream shopping Center, has the best pizza and
Italian meals in or around Dania Beach. Don't be put off by it's size, Pauli has all the room he needs to make consistently Excellent meals. If you want to eat in, they have 5 tables. They also
provide pick-up or delivery services.
